name: Brave Ghost
description:
*****Castle Kingdom™ is another great game for FREE*****
Introducing price: $0.99! Brave Ghost is an addictive, one finger gameplay based physics game (just like Angry Birds). Your goal is quite simple – save as many baby ghosts from danger as you can across 60 levels and bring them home.

“Even The Dead Respect Physics” - 4/5 by TouchMyApps

✓ Addicting one finger gameplay – touch and drag
✓ Real physics – interactions with gravity and repulsion
✓ 60 challenging levels across three stages
✓ Cute art style appealing to all ages
✓ Game center integrated – leaderboard and 12 achievements to unlock

The most exciting adventures begin!

Follow us on Twitter @nebulastudio

Please remember your encouraging reviews will help keep updates coming!
